_comment: ===== EXPERIMENT PARAMETERS =====
data should use one of the following: flowers, mnist, cifar10
number of training iterations
number of training images and synthesized images per model update
random seed
===== IMAGE DATA PARAMETERS =====
height and width of images
number of image channels (3 for color, 1 for grayscale)
gaussian noise to add to images when sampling from dataset
===== NETWORK AND OPTIMIZER =====
net_type should use one of the following: vanilla, nonlocal
optimizer_type should use one of the following: sgd, adam
initial learning rate for training
minimum learning rate for training
exponential decay for learning rate at each step (halt at lr_min)
===== LANGEVIN PARAMETERS =====
langevin step size and noise magnitude (set to 0 for noiseless learning)
number of langevin steps for training
shortrun_init should use one of the following: persistent, data, uniform, gaussian
===== DIAGNOSTIC PARAMTERS =====
frequency of saving network, images, and plots
boolean for running long-run langevin diagnostic during training
frequency of running long-run langevin diagnostic
number of steps for long-run langevin
longrun_init should use one of the following: persistent, data, uniform, gaussian
